markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Flinging Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1756) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You take a moment to center yourself, then unleash a powerful blow that sends your target tumbling away. Make an unarmed Strike. If you hit, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or be pushed up to 10 feet directly away from you (or 20 feet, on a critical failure) and fall [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). If another creature or physical object would prevent this movement, both your target and the blocking creature or object take 1d6 bludgeoning damage per 5 feet of movement that was prevented.
name: Flinging Blow

summary_markdown: You take a moment to center yourself, then unleash a powerful blow that sends your target tumbling away.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 16" pfs="Standard" > Flinging Blow Two Actions Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 130 2.0 --- You take a moment to center yourself, then unleash a powerful blow that sends your target tumbling away. Make an unarmed Strike. If you hit, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or be pushed up to 10 feet directly away from you (or 20 feet, on a critical failure) and fall prone. If another creature or physical object would prevent this movement, both your target and the blocking creature or object take 1d6 bludgeoning damage per 5 feet of movement that was prevented.
